snippet: India’s economy grew 6.5 percent in the fiscal year that ended in March, down from 8.4 percent the year before, its slowest pace in almost a decade.
abstract: India's economy grew 6.5 percent in the fiscal year that ended in March, down from 8.4 percent the year before, its slowest pace in almost a decade.
lead_paragraph: India’s economy grew 6.5 percent in the fiscal year that ended in March, down from 8.4 percent the year before, its slowest pace in almost a decade.

headline.seo: India’s Economic Slowdown Is Worse Than Expected
headline.main: Strains on India’s Government Grow After Sharp Economic Slowdown
headline.print_headline: Strains on India’s Government Grow After Sharp Economic Slowdown
